description: Content components (cards) and placeholder MDX content for all collections. CAN RUN IN PARALLEL with PRD-03 and PRD-05.

userStories.title: Import ChangelogCard.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the ChangelogCard component to display changelog entries in lists.

userStories.title: Import CustomerCard.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the CustomerCard component to display customer case studies.

userStories.title: Import TeamCard.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the TeamCard component to display team members.

userStories.title: Import JobCard.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the JobCard component to display job listings.

userStories.title: Import jobs/Cta.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the jobs CTA component for the bottom of job listings.

userStories.title: Import HelpCenterCard.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the HelpCenterCard component to display help articles.

userStories.title: Import Status.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Status component for the help center status page.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows status history or recent incidents

userStories.title: Create changelog placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder changelog entries so that the changelog pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 MDX changelog entries created
Each entry has: version, date, type, description
userStories.notes: Create fictional changelog entries like 'v1.0.0 - Initial Release', 'v1.1.0 - New Dashboard'

userStories.title: Create customers placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder customer case studies so that the customer pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 MDX customer entries created
Each entry has: name, logo, industry, quote, caseStudy
userStories.notes: Create fictional customers like 'Acme Corp', 'TechStart Inc', 'GlobalFinance SA'

userStories.title: Create team placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder team member profiles so that the team pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 MDX team member entries created
Each entry has: name, role, bio, image, social links
Roles include CEO, CTO, Lead Dev, Designer
userStories.notes: Create fictional team like 'Marie Dupont - CEO', 'Jean Martin - CTO'

userStories.title: Create jobs placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder job postings so that the jobs pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 2 MDX job entries created
Each entry has: title, department, location, type, description
Includes both technical and non-technical roles
userStories.notes: Create fictional jobs like 'Senior Full-Stack Developer', 'Product Designer'

userStories.title: Create helpcenter placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder help articles so that the help center pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 5 MDX help articles created
Each entry has: title, description, category, pubDate
Categories include: Getting Started, Account, Billing
userStories.notes: Create articles like 'How to create an account', 'Billing FAQ', 'Getting started guide'

userStories.title: Create legal placeholder content
userStories.description: As a developer, I want placeholder legal pages so that privacy and terms pages work.
acceptanceCriteria: privacy.mdx exists with privacy policy placeholder
terms.mdx exists with terms of service placeholder
Content is generic legal placeholder (not real legal advice)
userStories.notes: Use standard legal placeholder text, clearly marked as placeholder

userStories.title: Create PR to main for content phase
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a PR created so that the content components can be reviewed and merged.
acceptanceCriteria: All previous stories in this PRD pass
PR is created with gh pr create
PR title follows convention: feat(buio): content components and collections
PR description lists all components and content added
userStories.notes: Use gh pr create --title 'feat(buio): content components and collections' --body '...'
